author: MATTHEW DALY Associated Press
title: McConnell: Impeachment 'diverted attention' from coronavirus
description: Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell says President Donald Trump's impeachment trial distracted the federal government from paying attention to the novel coronavirus as it reached the United States in January
content:
WASHINGTON -- 
Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell says President Donald Trump's impeachment trial distracted the federal government from paying attention to the novel coronavirus as it reached the United States in January.
